attributes.action: deal firmly with Iran over the hostage situation, and if need be to judiciously use military strength to back up his stance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel that our military personnel deserve to be backed up fully by their political masters. In the case of Iran and the illegal capture of our citizens,operating under a UN mandate, those political masters should be willing to utilise military power judiciously as and when it is required to obtain their safe release. Whilst we hope for an entirely peaceful end to the situation, we want our government to know we support military action if they feel it is required.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
